bug.author: rschumi0
bug.description: The documentation of the <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/layers/LocallyConnected1D>LocallyConnected1D layer</denchmark-link> mentions the following for the strides argument: "Specifying any stride value != 1 is incompatible with specifying any dilation_rate value != 1." I assume this sentence was just copied from the Conv1D layer and should be removed since there is no dilation_rate argument for the LocallyConnected1D layer?

comments.comment: I am closing this issue as the associated PR got merged. Thanks!
